Text:
DivX Ultra....

Nice Format To Try....Insane Quality...Although not accepted by the Scene...

Misterpitydafoo.. thanks bro.....

What kind of program did you use?
Just wanna give it a try 'cause it can be played on my Philips standalone...and seems like it will be supported by more devices...


This is the true Mortal Kombat Movie dudes....

I used Divx author 1.5 which can be downloaded for free from pirate bay. You'll be amazed how easy the program makes creating divx videos and adding subtitles, audio, ect. I could just rip it as divx but I got a new dvd player that does divx ultra and i thought the features such as multiple audio tracks and embedded (and removable) subtitles. I know it hasn't been used too much in the official scene, but it is pretty useful.
